pr_title: Add docs for startup strategy information/examples (#1157)

timeline.message: Add startup strategy information/examples to mkdocs #1157

timeline.bodyText:
It does seem slightly odd to use a timeout with this strategy - is it intentional?
I'd suggest just:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            new IndefiniteWaitOneShotStartupCheckStrategy().withTimeout(Duration.ofSeconds(3))
          
          
            
                            new IndefiniteWaitOneShotStartupCheckStrategy()
          
      
    
    
  

should be appropriate...
timeline.author: rnorth

replies.bodyText:
@rnorth I'm sorry for not replying earlier, I was a little busy, but once I saw that you are going to merge I decided to reply straight away :)
That was intentional to show that even though timeout is 3 sec, the command executed on startup won't be interrupted and will continue executing as long as required (which is 5 sec)
replies.author: vcvitaly
